name: Vaporeon
description: Lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.effect: Whenever a water-type move hits this Pokémon, it heals for 1/4 of its maximum HP, negating any other effect on it.  Water moves will ignore this Pokémon's substitute.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.effect: This Pokémon is cured of any major status ailment after each turn during rain.
abilities.description: Heals status problems if it is raining.
